Articles.Content: So I was recently muddling around with a SSTO just to see if it could achieve orbit and I switched to my space station. Afterwards, when I looked at it from the M button view, it had this odd orange photo-like frame around it. I don't know if it's a bug or if I activated anything but it's a bit concerning. I am using the Mac version. Here's a photo of it:
I think there's a pending contract on that ship. Check Mission Control for a new contract that might apply to that craft; maybe they want to expand it or move it to a different orbit.
Okay, so yes. That was the thing, there was an expansion mission. Scared the hell out of me. Thanks millions

You're welcome.

If this was a correct answer, please mark it as such so others with the same question can find it. Hit the circled checkbox beside my reply to do so. And have a +1 on me.

Well, it's actually that an alien ship has locked a missile on your craft. It will be destroyed in a few hours to days. 
I suggest you set execute an evacuate order to the crew.

 

just kidding.
Nah, it's more exciting informative for them to see it from the station
